tr_quotes.quote: İyi olmaya çalışarak iyi olamazsın, ama zaten içinde olan iyiliği arayarak iyi olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Harekete geçmek her zaman mutluluk getirmeyebilir; ama harekete geçmeden mutluluk olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Yeteri kadar nedeniniz varsa, her şeyi yapabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Yapılamayacak gibiyse yap! Yapmazsan, var olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Arden

tr_quotes.quote: Siz konfor alanınızdayken asla harika sonuçlar ortaya çıkmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik sonsuzluğun anlatımıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Schelling

tr_quotes.quote: İnsana olanlar değil. O insanın içinde olanlar önemlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Louis Mann

tr_quotes.quote: Konu işlerin yürütülmesine gelince, motivasyon her şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Lacocca

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatınızı ortaya koymazsanız, hayatınızı kazanamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: İlk önce kendine ne olacağını sor; sonra ne yapmak gerekiyorsa yap.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetos

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük işler sanki hiç ölmeyecekmiş gibi çalışmakla başarılabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Vanvenarues

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sınırsız bir coşku duyduğu her şeyin üstesinden gelebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Schwab

tr_quotes.quote: Peşlerinden gedecek cesaretiniz varsa; bütün rüyalar gerçek olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Walt Disney

tr_quotes.quote: İstatistikler ne derse desin. Her durumda başarıya giden bir yol vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Bemard Segel

tr_quotes.quote: Batan güneş için ağlamayın; yeniden doğduğunda ne yapacağınıza karar verin.
tr_quotes.author: Dale Camegie

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse geriye gidip yeni bir başlangıç yapamaz; ama bugün yeni bir son yapıp yeniden başlayabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Frank M. Robinson

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamın ilginç yanlarından birisi de, en iyinin dışında bir şey kabul etmeyenlere genellikle en iyiyi vermesidir.
tr_quotes.author: W. Somerst Maugham

tr_quotes.quote: Her seferinde tek bir şey yapın ve bu tek şeyi, sanki hayatınız ona bağlıymışcasına yapın.
tr_quotes.author: Eugene Grace

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar hedeflerinden büyük olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Bundan bir yıl sonra bugün başlamış olmayı dileyeceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dualarınıza dikkat edin. Gerçekleşebilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Bir gün değil, her gün istersen olur.
tr_quotes.author: Tayfun Topaloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Sorunlar, bizim bilgeliğimizi ve cesaretimizi ortaya koyar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı kazanmanın kendisidir. İnanmak, başarmanın yarısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ağacın üzerine çıkmak istiyorsan hedefin yıldızlar olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Asla mutluluğa giden yol yoktur. Çünkü mutluluğun kendisi yoldur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir şeyin hayalini kurabiliyorsanız, onu yapmayı başarırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamınızdaki her sorun, içinde bir armağan saklar. Yeter ki inanın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç göremediğinize inanmaktır. Bunun ödülü de inandığınızı görmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı bir insan olmak için, kendi yıldızlarınızı meydana çıkarmalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Cesaretin büyük kısmı, o korkulan şeyi daha önce yapmış olmaktan kaynaklanır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnanın, gerçekten başarabileceğinize inanın, başarabilirsiniz ve başaracaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Küçük parçalara ayırdığınız takdirde üstesinde gelemeyeceğiniz hiçbir iş yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer inançlarınızı değiştirmezseniz hayatınız sonsuza kadar şimdi olduğu gibi kalır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öz güdüleme için ilk önemli dayanağınız, kendi hakkınızdaki inanç ve düşüncelerinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnciler kumsalda bulunmazlar, eğer bir tane istiyorsan onun için dalmalısın.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer irade gücünüzün pek olmadığını düşünüyorsanız, kendi başarınızı sabote ediyorsunuz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı gücünün anahtarı, en küçük şeyleri bile yapma, ama onları hemen yapma arzusu duymanızdadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize inanmak sihirdir. Bunu yapabilirseniz, her şeyi yapabilir, her şeyi gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnanmak, bir kişinin başarılı bir işletme kurabilmesi için ihtiyacı olan en önemli tuğlalardan biridir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayali olmayanın gerçekleştirmek istediği bir amacı, amacı olmayanın da hiç kimseye bir yararı dokunmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir zaman yeterince iyi olmadığınızı düşünmeyin. İnsanlar sizi sizin kendinizi gördüğünüz gibi görürler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Neyi arzuluyorsanız, bütün dikkatinizi onun üzerinde yoğunlaştırın; eninde sonunda gerçekleştiğini göreceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu ve hevesli bir insan olmak üzerine dikkatinizi toplayın; fazla bir zaman geçmeden öyle olduğunuzu göreceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir bitirici olduğunuza inanmak için, kendinize bunu kanıtlayacak bir dizi bitirilmiş görevler ortaya koymalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne duruyorsun be, at kendini denize. Yelken ol, kürek ol, dümen ol, balık ol, su ol. Git gidebildiğin yere.
tr_quotes.author: Orhan Veli Kanık

tr_quotes.quote: Daha önce hiç sahip olmadığın bir şeye sahip olmak istiyorsan, daha önce hiç yapmadığın bir şey yapmalısın.
tr_quotes.author: N. Peseschkian

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse geriye gidip yeni bir başlangıç yapamaz; ama bugün yeni bir son yapıp yeniden başlayabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Frank M. Robinson

tr_quotes.quote: Uğraş. Didin. Düşün. Ara. Bul. Koş. Atlı. Bağır. Durmak zamanı geçti çalışmak zamanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Tevfik Fikret

en_quotes.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: You will never win if you never begin
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows
en_quotes.author: Ralph Marston

en_quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
en_quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

en_quotes.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: When one must, one can
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

en_quotes.quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this
en_quotes.author: Joan of Arc

en_quotes.quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you
en_quotes.author: Henry Drummond

en_quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one
en_quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

en_quotes.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other
en_quotes.author: Walter Elliot

en_quotes.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Always desire to learn something useful
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better
en_quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

en_quotes.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door
en_quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

en_quotes.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one
en_quotes.author: Philip Sidney

en_quotes.quote: Never complain and never explain
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare
en_quotes.author: Bobby Knight

en_quotes.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future
en_quotes.author: Philip Emeagwali

en_quotes.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: It's always too early to quit
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: You have to make it happen
en_quotes.author: Denis Diderot

en_quotes.quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else
en_quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

en_quotes.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it
en_quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

en_quotes.quote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: Never, never, never give up
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you
en_quotes.author: George Whitefield

en_quotes.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another
en_quotes.author: John Dewey

en_quotes.quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals
en_quotes.author: Michael Korda

en_quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win
en_quotes.author: Ted Turner

en_quotes.quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead
en_quotes.author: George Lucas

en_quotes.quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: The more things you do, the more you can do
en_quotes.author: Lucille Ball

en_quotes.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward
en_quotes.author: Victor Kiam

en_quotes.quote: There's a way to do it better - find it
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail
en_quotes.author: John Donne

en_quotes.quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: I am not a has-been. I am a will be
en_quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

en_quotes.quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent
en_quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

en_quotes.quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself
en_quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

en_quotes.quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves
en_quotes.author: Richard Rorty

en_quotes.quote: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it
en_quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

en_quotes.quote: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Do whatever you do intensely
en_quotes.author: Robert Henri

en_quotes.quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them
en_quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

en_quotes.quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast
en_quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

en_quotes.quote: God always strives together with those who strive
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: If you think you can do it, you can
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me
en_quotes.author: Jerry West

en_quotes.quote: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up
en_quotes.author: Beverly Sills

en_quotes.quote: If you don't ask, you don't get
en_quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

en_quotes.quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
en_quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

en_quotes.quote: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different
en_quotes.author: Donna Brazile

en_quotes.quote: I come to win
en_quotes.author: Leo Durocher

en_quotes.quote: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: Hitch your wagon to a star
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: After a storm comes a calm
en_quotes.author: Matthew Henry

en_quotes.quote: To begin, begin
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: Know or listen to those who know
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: Wherever you are - be all there
en_quotes.author: Jim Elliot

en_quotes.quote: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Browne

en_quotes.quote: Only the educated are free
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: One finds limits by pushing them
en_quotes.author: Herbert A. Simon

en_quotes.quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it
en_quotes.author: George C. Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Never give in and never give up
en_quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

en_quotes.quote: Deserve your dream
en_quotes.author: Octavio Paz

en_quotes.quote: Either move or be moved
en_quotes.author: Ezra Pound

en_quotes.quote: From my tribe I take nothing, I am the maker of my own fortune
en_quotes.author: Tecumseh

en_quotes.quote: The more we do, the more we can do
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: How do you know you're going to do something, until you do it?
en_quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

en_quotes.quote: Step by step and the thing is done
en_quotes.author: Charles Atlas

en_quotes.quote: I can, therefore I am
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud
en_quotes.author: Emile Zola

en_quotes.quote: There is always room at the top
en_quotes.author: Daniel Webster

en_quotes.quote: A will finds a way
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: The dog that trots about finds a bone
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: Many are called but few get up
en_quotes.author: Oliver Herford

en_quotes.quote: Leap, and the net will appear
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: Don't think, just do
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: He conquers who endures
en_quotes.author: Persius

en_quotes.quote: They can conquer who believe they can
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: You never know what motivates you
en_quotes.author: Cicely Tyson

en_quotes.quote: Who seeks shall find
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: If you've got a talent, protect it
en_quotes.author: Jim Carrey
